content: *all my designs are free to download if you enjoy them please consider making a donation to your local humane society or animal care organization * this reversible cowl is light as meringue knit top-down and in-the-round with fingering weight yarn in simple stockinette and reverse stockinette stitches with little eyelets you will need a minimum of 420 - 520 yards of yarn for a cowl or a minimum of 840 - 1 100 yards of yarn for a deep cowl / small shoulder warmer instructions are included for two sizes 20 inch neck circumference and 22 50 inch neck circumference keep knitting for a larger shoulder warmer sample cowl is 20 inch size blocking required enjoy cowl 20 / 22 50 inches neck circumference 33 / 35 50 inches bottom circumference 15 inches height deep cowl / shoulder warmer 20 / 22 50 inches neck circumference 44 / 46 50 inches bottom circumference 24 inches height ce col réversible est aussi léger qu une meringue tricoté avec un fil de type «fingering/ sock» mailles endroit & mailles envers agrémenté de petits trous il vous faudra au minimum entre 385mts pour le col & 770mts pour la version plus large les instructions sont données pour les deux tailles 50cm & 57cm de circonférence bon tricot merci traduction en français par la compagnie des laines 1 pattern information language s english french number of pages 2 english 2 french instructions written sizes 2 circumference 2 height photos 2 1 http //www lacompagniedeslaines be/boutique/
